alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 2:27AM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ this afternoon to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Secure lawn furniture, garbage cans or other objects which could be blown about by the wind. Drivers of vans, campers, trailers and other high-profile vehicles should be alert to the danger of these winds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
